title: Prime Day won’t have this: AdGuard lifetime deal for just $16
description: Macworld Why waste time hunting for Prime Day sales you don’t even really need when Macworld’s Deal Days just dropped one you’ll actually use? You know those irritating ads getting in your way when you’re reading articles, streaming YouTube, and doing pretty much anything online? AdGuard blocks them all for good, and a lifetime subscription is now $15.97 with code FAMPLAN at checkout (reg. $169.99). This plan is ideal for families or anyone with multiple Apple (or Android) devices. Keep your iPhone, your kids’ iPads, and other tech free of distracting banners, intrusive pop-ups, and irritating video ads—AdGuard is designed to block all types of ads. AdGuard also simultaneously hides your online activity from malicious trackers and analyzers. It also protects users from malvertising, a common cyberattack where advertisements on legitimate websites link out to harmful destinations that might contain malware or phishing attempts.  If you have kids who are online more than you are, AdGuard offers handy parental controls. You can ensure your kids only watch, read, or listen to child-friendly content. Once you pay the one-time fee, this plan is yours for life. You’ll get complete access to this ad blocker, regular updates, and the latest features as you use AdGuard. Don’t miss our Deal Days offer! AdGuard’s lifetime subscription is only $15.97 with code FAMPLAN at checkout (reg. $169.99).
